metadata.title: CVE-2017-12940 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - low
metadata.description:
libunrar.a in UnRAR before 5.5.7 has an out-of-bounds read in theEncodeFileName::Decode call within the Archive::ReadHeader15 function.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-12940` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libunrar5 - 1:5.5.8-1
unrar - 1:5.5.8-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: unrar-nonfree package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:5.5.8-1').
